alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 03 at 4:23AM EDT until June 04 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Less than one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (2.9 to 3.4 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/11 AM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.7/ 1.1 3 None 04/12 AM 2.7/ 3.2 0.7/ 1.1 0.8/ 1.3 3 None 04/12 PM 2.3/ 2.8 0.4/ 0.9 0.8/ 1.3 3-4 None 05/01 AM 2.8/ 3.4 0.9/ 1.4 0.9/ 1.4 4 None 05/01 PM 2.3/ 2.8 0.4/ 0.9 0.8/ 1.3 3 None 06/02 AM 3.0/ 3.5 1.0/ 1.5 1.0/ 1.5 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
